word: Fruit of a Listless, Dreamy Mind (counsel to a young woman).--You have a diseased imagination. You have thought yourself diseased, but this has been more imaginary than real. You have been untrue to yourself. . . . You appeared like a person without a backbone. You were half reclining upon others, which is a wrong position for a lady to occupy in the presence of others. If you had only thought so, you could have walked as well and sat as erect as many others.
